content.prompt: The actions described in the eighth paragraph (“Mrs. Pontellier . . . fro”) build on the events presented in earlier paragraphs primarily by

choices.label: clarifying the intentions behind Mr. Pontellier’s pronouncement about Raoul
explaining the impact of the quarrel on the family as a whole
revealing the full context for Mr. Pontellier’s accusations against his wife
suggesting the intensity of Mrs. Pontellier’s feelings about the confrontation

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Explain the function of a particular sequence of events in a plot.
